title: Floral Vine Embroidered Tunic
image_prompt: high-resolution flat-lay product render of a women's tunic, crafted from lightweight cotton-silk blend, featuring intricate floral vine embroidery in contrasting thread colors across the front panel and cuffs, isolated on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, no model, no mannequin, no human elements
techpack: Front panel and sleeve cuffs to feature machine embroidery with floral vine motif in 3 thread colors; base fabric cotton-silk blend, 120gsm; neckline finished with contrast piping; side slits reinforced with bar-tack stitching; garment length 32 inches; sleeve length 18 inches; straight silhouette with relaxed fit.
provenance: Inspired by contemporary Indian embroidery trends, adapted for commercial tunic wear with manufacturable machine embroidery techniques.
